name: Ameredia
tag_list: multicultural, marketing, advertising, public-relations, diverse, strategic, planning, translation, events, grassroots, creative, design
overview:
San Francisco-based Améredia is a multicultural advertising, marketing and public relations firm specializing in reaching U.S.-based ethnic communities including Asians, Europeans, Hispanics, Middle Easterners, Pacific Islanders, Africans and other diverse cultural groups.

Key services include strategic planning and consulting, diversity branding, in-language creative and design, ethnic media planning and buying, translation, transcreation and localization, direct marketing, events and promotions, grassroots marketing, market research, PR and community relations.

Specialties: Multicultural, Advertising, Marketing, Public Relations, Languages, Multilingual, Ethnic, Diverse, Translation, Diversity, African, Asian, Hispanic, Latino, European, Media, Creative, Design, Events, Direct Marketing, Grassroots, Demographics
